frameDefinitions: An Agent is described as pursuing an Activity, expending some effort.
An Event with multiple Participants takes place.
This frame concerns a Perceiver's state of readiness to process and consider impressions of a Figure within a Ground.
A Trajector is identified as occurring at the same time as some better-known Landmark.
An Experiencer has an emotion as caused by a Stimulus or concerning a Topic.
frameExamples: Sky, a Korean War veteran, was <t>active</t> in his opposition to Vietnam and continues to protest current combat in Iraq.
MATAC looks forward to your <t>participation</t> in helping promote telework in the Mid-Atlantic region.
Legislator tells consumers to be <t>alert</t> to dioxin levels.
He tried to take care of that <t>on</t> his last visit .
I fall asleep hours later to the sound of their <t>engrossed</t> murmuring.
listRoleDefinitions: This role identifies the name of the ongoing <fen>Activity</fen> in which an <fen>Agent</fen> engages.
The <fen>Agent</fen> engages in an ongoing <fen>Activity</fen>.
An entity acted upon by the <fen>Agent</fen>.
This role identifies the role filled by the <fen>Agent</fen> which is saliently associated with an <fen>Activity</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Activity</fen> is pursued.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the  <fen>Activity</fen> is pursued.
The individuals or entities that have been participants in an <fen>Event</fen>.
<fen>Participant_1</fen> is the grammatically more prominent participant in an <fen>Event</fen> with multiple <fen>Participants</fen>.
A grammatically less prominent participant of an <fen>Event</fen> with multiple <fen>Participants</fen>.
An <fen>Event</fen> with multiple <fen>Participants</fen>, who may or may not be involved intentionally.
A group, location, or institution conventionally associated with an <fen>Event</fen>.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the multiple-participant <fen>Event</fen> occurs.
The location where the <fen>Event</fen> involving multiple <fen>Participants</fen> occurs.
The individual that pays attention to the <fen>Ground</fen>.
The entity that the <fen>Perceiver</fen> is specifically focussing on within the <fen>Ground</fen>.
An entity (or event) associated with a <fen>Perceiver</fen> that gives evidence for a <fen>Perceiver</fen>'s attentiveness.
The entity that occurs at some time.
The event which designates the time at which a trajector occurs.
The period that occurs with respect to some other time.
The period in which a trajector takes place.  This period can be cyclical and, in that case, is interpreted contextually.
The event that occurs at some time.
The entity which designates the time of some trajector.  Note: this role is infrequent or non-existent in English and is included for completeness.
The <fen>Experiencer</fen> is the person or sentient entity that experiences or feels the emotions.
The <fen>Topic</fen> is the general area in which the emotion occurs.  It indicates a range of possible <fen>Stimulus</fen>.
The <fen>Stimulus</fen> is the person, event, or state of affairs that evokes the emotional response in the <fen>Experiencer</fen>.
The <fen>State</fen> is the abstract noun that describes a more lasting experience by the <fen>Experiencer</fen>.

The body part, gesture, or other expression of the <fen>Experiencer</fen> that reflects his or her emotional state.  They describe a presentation of the experience or emotion denoted by the adjective or noun.
The Time when the <fen>Experiencer</fen> is has a feeling about the <fen>Stimulus</fen>.
listRoleExamples: He is always active <fex>demolishing the painted figures of men's faith</fex> and then is astonished to find the faith still there clothed in new figure.
<fex>He</fex> was active for six decades as a painter, graphic designer and theorist of art and design.
<fex>As many as 324 companies' stocks</fex> were active across the board.
Jacques Fuller has been active <fex>as a sculptor</fex> in Bloemfontein for almost two decades.
Commercial selling was active <fex>yesterday</fex> but a lack of interest allowed the market to push sharply higher into the mid-session.
He is retired from Whirlpool Corp. in Clyde and is active <fex>at the YMCA</fex>.
Thereafter, <fex>everybody</fex> participated in the 17 May parade ending in the Nordic Club.
Last year, <fex>Bill</fex> participated in the Montana State University Earth Systems Science distance learning course in the Atmosphere Unit.

The Second Amended Complaint alleges that Andrew S. Pitt ('Pitt'), Conectisys Corporation ('Conectisys' or the 'Company'), and BM
Capital Corp. participated <fex>with Zaman and Smith Benton</fex> in a fraudulent and manipulative trading scheme.
Some who participated <fex>in D-Day</fex> are finally ready to talk about it
Several of the countries were unable to participate <fex>in the market</fex> .

A survey of students who participated <fex>last year</fex> showed that 61 percent would be the
first in their family to attend college.
The most exciting tours for Mr. Osako were when he participated <fex>in France, Belgium, Holland, Cuba and Japan</fex>.
The current <fex>President of Georgia</fex> was born in Tbilisi.
During <fex>last night's walk</fex> , I stubbed my toe.
Future <fex>eras</fex> will be vastly changed from today.
I went to the store on <fex>Tuesday</fex>.
Currently, <fex>researchers are making new discoveries very quickly.</fex>
